articles.author: Adrienne Klasa, Richard Milne
articles.title: Pernod Ricard to stop Absolut vodka exports to Russia after Swedish outcry - Financial Times
articles.description: French group faced storm of criticism from Swedish politicians and calls for its drinks to be boycotted
articles.content: Pernod Ricard is to halt exports of Absolut vodka to Russia after it faced a storm of criticism from politicians and calls to boycott its drinks by prominent restaurants in the liquors homeland of Sw… [+3061 chars]
